data.text: @nickmward Look after yourself and rest when you need to. You're well supported and the ethos of SiMS is to look after yourself first so you can be strong enough to support others. Take care Nick 💜
@nickmward I didn’t get a cough till after I became negative. Some days I’m just wiped out
@ItsOnlySimon Sorry to hear that because it sucks
@nickmward Going through much the same thing
@CharleneTait_SA Thanks pal. I shall try and be patient… but you know that’s not my forte!!! 😂
@nickmward Take care and take your time, you will get there.

@LauraFMcConnell @markmakeslinks Thanks team. I carved it myself… 
Frustration is the correct word because I want so desperately to just be fine and my body to be reliable again!
@nickmward I mean, that fireplace though!!! 😍 I hope it starts to ease soon. I can only imagine the frustration :/
@nickmward Get on the mend soon sir, we need you, your the helm of our ship, we don't want our ship to run into the other iceberg on the other side!! No seriously rest up and get well soon Nick!
